<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">
[Shall Not Falter, Shall Not Rout](/Spells.aspx?ID=817)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 69

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Calling out the fifth line of the Crimson Oath, you seal your most grievous injuries with a stroke of your blade. The first time each round that you Strike with your weapon and deal damage to a foe, you recover a number of HP equal to twice _shall not falter, shall not rout's_ level. This healing can't raise your current HP above half of your maximum HP.
name: Shall Not Falter, Shall Not Rout
